Text.Page:
We can depart once the recruits come back.

Zolyn doesn't like waiting. Could you pass on the message that the soldiers have completed their preparations?
Dougal tells you the details of the mission. He is determined that this mission will be a success.

Hmph. . I know your reputation. Nature reaps and you're her sickle.

I don't suppose you know Syona, the elin princess?"I'm afraid not."

No matter.

Well, you got our supplies squared away and our troopers back on their feet. That's more than the rest of these tuwangis can say!

Here's the sky cruiser's actuator. Dougal's waiting for it.
<PCNAME>! Good to have your courage by our side. Are you ready?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Ready when you are."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

The actuator. Now we can finally leave. Excellent.

We're headed to Northern Arun. We believe the demokrons origin lies thereâ€¦and a more personal mystery.

We'll talk more later.

Let's board now. I want to get under way.

Pyon will transport you to the ship when you're ready.

Welcome aboard! Isn't she magnificent? Larger than a sailing warship, capable of ferrying a full company of troops.

I'm not privy to all her secrets, but I know a lot of argon technology led to the sky cruisers.
If you're ready, I'll show you to your cabin.

You saved Actol and I, . Thank you.

Don't worry; no more filching elixirs for us.
